casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana
v.
Herbert A. PIERRE, Jr. NO. 2018-KH-1573 Supreme Court of Louisiana. December 17, 2018 WRIT NOT CONSIDERED. Petitioner has not demonstrated that he sought review in the court(s) below before filing in this Court nor shown the "extraordinary circumstances" that would justify bypassing that level of review. La.S.Ct.R. X § 5(b). GUIDRY, J., recused.
